alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 8:37PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...BRIEF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS DROPPING SOUTH ACROSS NORTH CENTRAL AND AND NORTHEAST MASSACHUSETTS... HAZARDS...Brief heavy snow showers which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow showers may also result in a quick coating of snow on roadways and brief strong wind gusts up to 40 mph. Motorists are urged to drive with extra caution. THESE SNOW SHOWERS WILL BE NEAR... Lexington, Wilmington anD Lincoln around 835 PM EST. Waltham, Woburn, Wakefield, Reading and Burlington around 840 PM EST. Cambridge, Newton, Somerville, Arlington, Watertown, Melrose, Belmont, Stoneham and Winchester around 845 PM EST. Boston, Lynn, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Everett, Chelsea and Saugus around 850 PM EST. Winthrop and Nahant around 855 PM EST. Quincy and Hull around 905 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
